activities: Southwest Publishing & Mailing Corp is a direct mail services company.  The company utilizes mailing lists compiled by our clients to produce direct advertising mailings for those clients.  The company prints, and does all the mailing processes those mailings.  The company works for mostly non-profit organizations in their fund raising campaigns.  The company does not compile mailing lists, but uses lists that are provided by its clients.
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Portugal, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Dispute Resolution Service
